short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mixed for Chrome provides the ability to quickly save web pages, images, text to the Mixed board resource library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mixed for Chrome provides the ability to quickly save web pages, images, text, and other content to the Mixed board resource library, offering efficient information collection and organization capabilities.
